pullRequest.title: Issue #8328: Change name of checkstyle types to be close to real java types - enums
pullRequest.bodyText:
#8328
Refactored -

ClosingParensOption
ElementStyleOption
TrailingArrayCommaOption

All other enums already have Option suffix already and just required a bit of renaming in property_types.html related files

afterCommit.message: Issue #8328: Change name of checkstyle types to be close to real java types - enums

nodes.bodyText: Property names are not expected to be changed. This will break configurations.
Issue says there should be no space. I was under the impression enums display name should be the same as the class name.
